title: Beyond The Crypto Winter
description: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies remain deeply depressed. Join Daren Fonda, crypto and finance editor at Barron's, and Mark Palmer, fintech analyst at brokerage firm BTIG, to discuss digital assets and stocks that would benefit from a recovery in crypto.
